Event.cpp

00001 #include <System/Event.h>
00002 #include <System/SimpleException.h>
00003 
00004 #include <errno.h>
00005 
00006 using namespace Omiscid;
00007 
00008 Event::Event()
00009 {
00010 #ifndef WIN32
00011     if(pthread_mutex_init(&mutex, NULL) != 0)
00012         throw SimpleException("Error Mutex Init");
00013     if(pthread_cond_init(&condition, NULL) != 0)
00014         throw SimpleException("Error Condition Init");
00015 #else
00016     if((handle = CreateEvent(NULL, TRUE, FALSE, NULL)) == NULL)
00017         throw  SimpleException("Error CreateEvent");
00018 #endif /* WIN32 */
00019 }
00020 
00021 Event::~Event()
00022 {
00023 #ifndef WIN32
00024     pthread_cond_destroy(&condition);
00025     pthread_mutex_destroy(&mutex);
00026 #else
00027     CloseHandle(handle);
00028 #endif /* WIN32 */
00029 }
00030 
00031 void Event::Reset()
00032 {
00033 #ifdef WIN32
00034     ResetEvent(handle);
00035 #endif
00036 }
00037 
00038 void Event::Signal()
00039 {
00040 #ifndef WIN32
00041     pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex);
00042     pthread_cond_broadcast(&condition);
00043     pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex);
00044 #else
00045     SetEvent(handle);
00046 #endif /* WIN32 */
00047 }
00048 
00049 bool Event::Wait(unsigned long timer)
00050 {
00051 #ifndef WIN32
00052     pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex);
00053     if(timer == 0)
00054     {
00055         pthread_cond_wait(&condition, &mutex);
00056         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex);
00057         return true;
00058     }
00059     else
00060     {
00061         struct timeval now;
00062         struct timespec timeout;
00063         int retcode;
00064 
00065         int second = timer/1000;
00066         int nanos = (timer-second*1000)*1000000;
00067 
00068         gettimeofday(&now, NULL);
00069 
00070         // Compute time until where we must wait
00071         timeout.tv_sec = now.tv_sec + second;
00072         timeout.tv_nsec = now.tv_usec * 1000 + nanos;
00073         // If nano is over 1 s, remove it. Shoud appear only once but put a while...
00074         while ( timeout.tv_nsec > 1000000000 )
00075         {
00076             timeout.tv_nsec -= 1000000000;
00077             timeout.tv_sec  += 1;
00078         }
00079 
00080         retcode = pthread_cond_timedwait(&condition, &mutex, &timeout);
00081         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex);
00082 
00083         return (retcode == 0);
00084     }
00085 #else
00086     if ( timer == 0 )
00087     {
00088         for(;;)
00089         {
00090             int ret = WaitForSingleObject(handle, INFINITE);
00091             switch( ret )
00092             {
00093                 case WAIT_TIMEOUT:
00094                     continue;
00095 
00096                 case WAIT_OBJECT_0:
00097                     return true;
00098 
00099                 default:
00100                     return false;
00101             }
00102         }
00103     }
00104     else
00105     {
00106         if ( WaitForSingleObject(handle, timer) == WAIT_OBJECT_0 )
00107         {
00108             // We've got it !
00109             return true;
00110         }
00111         return false;
00112     }
00113 #endif
00114 }
